languages.text: "Проклятые слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}, напавшие на этот корабль, унесли жизни верных членов твоей команды. И сделали сиротами многих детей — включая отпрысков храбрейших офицеров, защищавших свои посты до конца. Я не знаю, как заведено поступать в таких случаях во владениях фон Валанциус, но в привычном мне мире дети павших храбрецов могут рассчитывать на особое внимание. Быть может, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} мог{mf||ла} бы встретиться с сиротами?"

traits.locale_text: "Проклятые слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}, напавшие на этот корабль, унесли жизни верных членов твоей команды. И сделали сиротами многих детей — включая отпрысков храбрейших офицеров, защищавших свои посты до конца. Я не знаю, как заведено поступать в таких случаях во владениях фон Валанциус, но в привычном мне мире дети павших храбрецов могут рассчитывать на особое внимание. Быть может, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} мог{mf||ла} бы встретиться с сиротами?"

languages.text: "The accursed servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} who assaulted this ship took the lives of your loyal crew members. And they orphaned many children — including the progeny of the brave officers who defended their posts until the bitter end. I don't know what customary practices there are for cases like this in von Valancius territory, but in the world I'm familiar with, the children of such brave souls could expect to receive some special consideration. Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} could meet with the orphans?"
languages.original_text: "Проклятые слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}, напавшие на этот корабль, унесли жизни верных членов твоей команды. И сделали сиротами многих детей — включая отпрысков храбрейших офицеров, защищавших свои посты до конца. Я не знаю, как заведено поступать в таких случаях во владениях фон Валанциус, но в привычном мне мире дети павших храбрецов могут рассчитывать на особое внимание. Быть может, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} мог{mf||ла} бы встретиться с сиротами?"

traits.locale_text: "The accursed servants of Chaos who assaulted this ship took the lives of your loyal crew members. And they orphaned many children — including the progenies of the bravest officers who guarded their stations until the bitter end. I don't know what customary practices there are for cases like this in the von Valancius territory, but in the world I'm familiar with, the children of such brave souls could expect to receive special attention. Perhaps the Rogue Trader could meet with the orphans?"

languages.text: “那些侍奉{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的邪恶仆从，他们夺走了许多忠诚船员的性命，让很多孩子沦为了孤儿。其中一部分孩子的父母还是勇气可嘉的军官，他们一直坚守岗位，直到生命的最后一刻。我不知道冯·瓦兰修斯家族处理这样的事情有没有什么惯例，但在我所熟悉的世界中，这些勇士的孩子们应该可以得到一些特殊关怀。或许，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}可以去见那些孤儿们一面？”
languages.original_text: "The accursed servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} who assaulted this ship took the lives of your loyal crew members. And they orphaned many children — including the progeny of the brave officers who defended their posts until the bitter end. I don't know what customary practices there are for cases like this in von Valancius territory, but in the world I'm familiar with, the children of such brave souls could expect to receive some special consideration. Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} could meet with the orphans?"

traits.locale_text: “那些侍奉{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的邪恶仆从，他们夺走了许多忠诚船员的性命，让很多孩子沦为了孤儿。其中一部分孩子的父母还是勇气可嘉的军官，他们一直坚守岗位，直到生命的最后一刻。我不知道冯·瓦兰修斯家族处理这样的事情有没有什么惯例，但在我所熟悉的世界中，这些勇士的孩子们应该可以得到一些特殊关怀。或许，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}可以去见那些孤儿们一面？”

languages.text: «Los viles esbirros del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g} que atacaron la nave se cobraron las vidas de sus fieles tripulantes. También dejaron huérfanos a muchos niños, incluyendo a los hijos de valientes oficiales que defendieron sus puestos hasta el fin. No sé cuáles son las prácticas acostumbradas en el territorio de los von Valancius, pero en el mundo que conozco los hijos de estos valientes merecen un poco de consideración especial. ¿Tal vez podrían tener un encuentro con su {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}?».
languages.original_text: "The accursed servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} who assaulted this ship took the lives of your loyal crew members. And they orphaned many children — including the progeny of the brave officers who defended their posts until the bitter end. I don't know what customary practices there are for cases like this in von Valancius territory, but in the world I'm familiar with, the children of such brave souls could expect to receive some special consideration. Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} could meet with the orphans?"

traits.locale_text: «Los viles esbirros del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g} que atacaron la nave se cobraron las vidas de sus fieles tripulantes. También dejaron huérfanos a muchos niños, incluyendo a los hijos de valientes oficiales que defendieron sus puestos hasta el fin. No sé cuáles son las prácticas acostumbradas en el territorio de los von Valancius, pero en el mundo que conozco los hijos de estos valientes merecen un poco de consideración especial. ¿Tal vez podrían tener un encuentro con su {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}?».

languages.text: 「この船を襲撃した{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の呪われた手下たちは、忠実な乗組員の命を奪った。そして、多くの子供たちを孤児にしたのだ。…その中には、最後まで持ち場を守った勇敢な士官の子も含まれている。フォン・ヴァランシウス領でこのような場合にどのような慣習があるのか知らないが、私のよく知る世界では、そのような勇敢な魂の子供たちは特別な配慮を受けるものだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}が、それらの孤児と面会することはかなわないだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "The accursed servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} who assaulted this ship took the lives of your loyal crew members. And they orphaned many children — including the progeny of the brave officers who defended their posts until the bitter end. I don't know what customary practices there are for cases like this in von Valancius territory, but in the world I'm familiar with, the children of such brave souls could expect to receive some special consideration. Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} could meet with the orphans?"

traits.locale_text: 「この船を襲撃した{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の呪われた手下たちは、忠実な乗組員の命を奪った。そして、多くの子供たちを孤児にしたのだ。…その中には、最後まで持ち場を守った勇敢な士官の子も含まれている。フォン・ヴァランシウス領でこのような場合にどのような慣習があるのか知らないが、私のよく知る世界では、そのような勇敢な魂の子供たちは特別な配慮を受けるものだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}が、それらの孤児と面会することはかなわないだろうか？」

languages.text: "Durch die verfluchten Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}, die dieses Schiff angegriffen haben, haben loyale Crewmitglieder ihr Leben verloren. Viele Kinder wurden dadurch zu Waisen – einschließlich der Nachkommen der tapferen Offiziere, die ihren Posten bis zum bitteren Ende verteidigt haben. Ich weiß nicht, was in Fällen wie diesem im Territorium derer von Valancius Brauch ist, aber in der Welt, die ich kenne, erhalten die Kinder derart mutiger Seelen irgendeine Form von besonderer Wertschätzung. Vielleicht würde {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} einem Treffen mit den Waisen zustimmen?"
languages.original_text: "The accursed servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} who assaulted this ship took the lives of your loyal crew members. And they orphaned many children — including the progeny of the brave officers who defended their posts until the bitter end. I don't know what customary practices there are for cases like this in von Valancius territory, but in the world I'm familiar with, the children of such brave souls could expect to receive some special consideration. Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} could meet with the orphans?"

traits.locale_text: "Durch die verfluchten Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}, die dieses Schiff angegriffen haben, haben loyale Crewmitglieder ihr Leben verloren. Viele Kinder wurden dadurch zu Waisen – einschließlich der Nachkommen der tapferen Offiziere, die ihren Posten bis zum bitteren Ende verteidigt haben. Ich weiß nicht, was in Fällen wie diesem im Territorium derer von Valancius Brauch ist, aber in der Welt, die ich kenne, erhalten die Kinder derart mutiger Seelen irgendeine Form von besonderer Wertschätzung. Vielleicht würde {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einem Treffen mit den Waisen zustimmen?"

languages.text: « Lorsque les maudits serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} ont attaqué ce vaisseau et tué vos loyaux membres d'équipage, ils ont fait de nombreux orphelins, dont les enfants des vaillants officiers qui ont défendu leur poste jusqu'à leur dernier souffle. Je ne connais pas les pratiques de votre domaine dans ce genre de situation, mais là d'où je viens, il est d'usage d'accorder une considération particulière aux survivants des braves qui ont perdu la vie au combat. {mf|Le|La} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} acceptera peut-être de rencontrer ces orphelins ? »
languages.original_text: "The accursed servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} who assaulted this ship took the lives of your loyal crew members. And they orphaned many children — including the progeny of the brave officers who defended their posts until the bitter end. I don't know what customary practices there are for cases like this in von Valancius territory, but in the world I'm familiar with, the children of such brave souls could expect to receive some special consideration. Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} could meet with the orphans?"

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque les maudits serviteurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} ont attaqué ce vaisseau et tué vos loyaux membres d'équipage, ils ont fait de nombreux orphelins, dont les enfants des vaillants officiers qui ont défendu leur poste jusqu'à leur dernier souffle. Je ne connais pas les pratiques de votre domaine dans ce genre de situation, mais là d'où je viens, il est d'usage d'accorder une considération particulière aux survivants des braves qui ont perdu la vie au combat. {mf|Le|La} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} acceptera peut-être de rencontrer ces orphelins ? »

languages.text: "Bu gemiye saldırıp sadık tayfaları canından eden {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos'un{/g} lanetli hizmetkârları, birçok çocuğu öksüz bıraktı. Bu çocuklar arasında, görev yerini terk etmeyip ölümü dimdik karşılayan gözü pek subayların evlatları da vardı. Von Valancius hanesinin bu durumlarda uyguladığı gelenekler nedir, nasıldır bilemem ancak... Benim dünyamda bu cesur yüreklerin çocuklarına ayrıcalık tanınır. Uygun görürsen... {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} bu çocuklarla bizzat tanışması taraftarıyım."
languages.original_text: "The accursed servants of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} who assaulted this ship took the lives of your loyal crew members. And they orphaned many children — including the progeny of the brave officers who defended their posts until the bitter end. I don't know what customary practices there are for cases like this in von Valancius territory, but in the world I'm familiar with, the children of such brave souls could expect to receive some special consideration. Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} could meet with the orphans?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu gemiye saldırıp sadık mürettebat üyelerini canından eden {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g}'un lanetli hizmetkârları, birçok çocuğu öksüz bıraktı. Bu çocuklar arasında, görev yerini terk etmeyip ölümü dimdik karşılayan gözü pek subayların soyları da vardı. Von Valancius hükmünde bu durumlar için uygulanan gelenekler nedir, nasıldır bilemem ancak… Benim dünyamda bu cesur yüreklerin çocuklarına ayrıcalık tanınır. Uygun görürsen… {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in bu çocuklarla bizzat tanışması taraftarıyım."
